pullrequest.title: per issue #194, alternative solution, add ROS service, allowing user to change joint damping with hard coded per joint bounds

content.raw: To respond to @tkoolen's comment on BDI controller:  The purpose of adding the ability to adjust cfm damping dynamically is to make it easier for teams, and I updated my comment in issue #194 to be more specific about the simulation noise induced dynamic instability, which is not the driving force for the new feature introduced in pull request #248, and that we are not changing the bounds as [posted in the user guide](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/UserGuide#ROS_Services).
